entries.description: RDS serverless databases are now visible in the RDS node in the explorer
Fix transient 'Aborted!' message on successful SAM CLI local Lambda execution
Fix being unable to open the file browser in the Schemas download panel
Fix being unable to type/copy paste into the SAM local run config's template path textbox
Fix Secrets Manager-based databse auth throwing NullPointer when editing settings in 2020.3.2 (Fixes #2403)
Fix making an un-needed service call on IDE startup (#2426)
